text:
e="preserve">Vigolvino Wanderley Mariz (November 2, 1940 – July 2, 2020) was a Brazilian politician and lawyer. He was born in Caicó, Rio Grande do Norte. He was a member of the Chamber of Deputies from 1975 to 1987. He was a member of the Christian Democracy.
On July 2, 2020, Mariz died in Natal, Rio Grande do Norte from COVID-19, aged 79.
